alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 19 at 3:45AM PDT until March 21 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...The mountains of LA and Ventura Counties and the Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
